data.actual_result: Emote menu pops up randomly and you’re not even typing. (Also happens randomly with still emotes, but you’d also find yourself being unable to scroll the chat)
data.expected_result: Emote menu should stay down, and it looks like you’re not browsing emotes to use.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an still emote (Discord’s emote or custom emote) - Have someone to send an animated emote (by itself). - Observe what happens after you send it. - If for some reason, you cannot reproduce, try that method several times with multiple different emotes. Make sure you’re not using the iOS default emotes.
